title: 2012 Kazakhstan Cup
text:
The 2012 Kazakhstan Cup is the 21st season of the <a href="Kazakhstan%20Cup">Kazakhstan Cup</a>, the annual nationwide <a href="Association%20football">football</a> cup competition of <a href="Kazakhstan">Kazakhstan</a> since the independence of the country. The competition begins on 16 May 2012 and will end with the final on 11 November 2012. <a href="FC%20Ordabasy">Ordabasy</a> are the defending champions, having won their first cup in the <a href="2011%20Kazakhstan%20Cup">2011 competition</a>.
The winner of the competition will qualify for the <a href="2013%E2%80%9314%20UEFA%20Europa%20League%23First%20qualifying%20round">first qualifying round</a> of the <a href="2013%E2%80%9314%20UEFA%20Europa%20League">2013–14 UEFA Europa League</a>.
First round.
The draw was conducted on 18 April 2012 at the offices of the <a href="Football%20Federation%20of%20Kazakhstan">Football Federation of Kazakhstan</a>. Entering this round are 30 clubs from both the 2012 <a href="2012%20Kazakhstan%20Premier%20League">Premier League</a> and <a href="2012%20Kazakhstan%20First%20Division">First Division</a> seasons. The matches took place on 15th and 16 May 2012.
Second round.
Entering this round of the competition were the 14 winners from the First round (<a href="FC%20Taraz">Taraz</a>, <a href="FC%20Ak%20Bulak">Ak-Bulak</a>, <a href="FC%20CSKA%20Almaty">CSKA Almaty</a>, <a href="FC%20Okzhetpes">Okzhetpes</a>, <a href="FC%20Akzhayik">Akzhayik</a>, <a href="FC%20Kaisar">Kaisar</a>, <a href="FC%20Aktobe">Aktobe</a>, <a href="FC%20Lashyn">Lashyn</a>, <a href="FC%20Shakhter%20Karagandy">Shakhter Karagandy</a>, <a href="FC%20Zhetysu">Zhetysu</a>, <a href="FC%20Astana">Astana</a>, <a href="FC%20Tsesna">Kairat Academy</a>, <a href="FC%20Irtysh%20Pavlodar">Irtysh</a> and <a href="FC%20Kairat">Kairat</a>) and the two finalists from last year's cup competition, <a href="FC%20Ordabasy">Ordabasy</a> and <a href="FC%20Tobol">Tobol</a>. The first legs are on 20 June 2012, the return games - on 27 June 2012.
Quarterfinals.
Entering this round of the competition were the eight winners from the Second round. The first legs are on 19 September 2012, the return games - on 29 September 2012.
Semifinals.
Entering this round of the competition were the four winners from the Quarterfinals. The first legs are on 1 November 2012, the return games - on 5 November 2012.
